Headline: #47 47th Temporary Reroute at 47th/Champlain
ShortDescription: 47 47th buses are temporarily rerouted via 47th, Cottage Grove, 43rd, St. Lawrence and 47th, due to street blockage near 47th/Champlain.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#47 47th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 47th, Cottage Grove, 43rd, St. Lawrence and 47th, due to street blockage near 47th/Champlain.

Allow extra travel time.
